result.title: TLE '16 October [Contest announcement]
result.content:
Hello Codeforces users!

ZQFMGB12, nathanlo99 and I would like to invite everyone to write the Trudeau Logic Evaluation (TLE) 2016 October contest. The TLE is a monthly contest series written by high school students, predominantly from Pierre Elliott Trudeau High School, Canada. The contest serves as preparation for OI-style contests such as CCO (Canadian Computing Olympiad) and IOI (International Olympiad in Informatics). The contest will be hosted on the DMOJ platform.

The contest will consist of 6 problems, and the problem difficulty will range from Div. 2 A to Div. 1 C/D :) . Only problems 4, 5, and 6 will have pretests, and partial points (in the form of subtasks) will be awarded!

The contest window will be 11 hours long and will last from 12:00 EDT to 23:00 EDT on October 20th, 2016. You may start your 3 hour interval at any time during this contest window, but be wary of the hard deadline at 23:00 EDT if you want to start late!

We hope that you will enjoy the contest and will receive many internet points!

EDIT: The contest will be starting in 24 hours

EDIT 2: The contest is starting in 1 hour!

EDIT 3: The contest is now over. Thank you to everyone who joined the contest!
